title: I just realized I'm so addicted to Memes and Games that it physically hurts when I get downvoted...
body:
http://orig15.deviantart.net/3591/f/2011/030/d/0/shot_through_the_heart_by_mahsa-d38g9aq.jpg

What have you done to me, Memes and Games? I used to go here for Gameplay.

replies.body: Downvoted because Jhin must always be at 4.
The greedy desire for upvotes makes me sad, but the necessary duty to uphold art thanks you.
I'll upvot this to balance it out for you :)
I used to think arrows were original, until I took an arr... no, I'm not going there.
At least it's not in the knee, you can still be an adventurer.

There is a point in time where you grow strong enough to shrug off the upvotes. Where you learn to sway with the hurricane of salt. When you know where and how to withdraw.

Only then have you mastered the Boards.

######Then if you want to go beyond that you go to GD and try to survive.
